jhelp.util.resources

Class ResourceText

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.resources.ResourceText

  • public final class ResourceText
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a resources of texts.
    Texts are describes in XML.
    Must have an XML per language, and a generic XML (by default). Each XML are : The markup "Text" defines an association to a "key" with some text. The parameter "key" specify the text key. The text between opening and closing markup "Text" is the corresponding text in the specific language.
    Author:
    JHelp
